name: Soul (Pith_Dev)
description:
Possessing the soul of a statue within the caverns far below, you must make the most of your mystical abilities to break through the confines of the dungeon.

This project is a test of my understanding of the Unity Engine!  Originally starting as a summer project, I decided to test the concept of mixing top-down movement into a 2D platformer.

Special Thanks:

Phantom - Game Composer

coll.i.flower - Artist/animator

Igor - Artist

Jackson - Editor
